title: 'Beautiful' Script ID?
content:
trying to find out what typeface this is? can anyone help me out?

comments.content: **[MetroScript](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725131856/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/alphabetsoup/metroscript/)** by Michael Doret [Alphabet Soup , 2006] using stylistic alternates for /t & /l
